link.description: This document outlines the General Requirements for the project, providing an overview of the Bioinformatic Chatbot's purpose, design, and functionality. It includes a system overview that provides a high-level summary of the project, followed by a system block diagram that is a visual representation and explanation of key components. The general requirements define the hardware and software requirements needed to run the chatbot smoothly alongside a feature and requirements section detailing the functional and non-functional requirements. Additionally, this section provides use case descriptions that illustrate real-world scenarios. This is the foundation for a shared understanding between the stakeholders and the project team.
